### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Offshore Pump at position(106.5, -32.5)
Consists of offshore pump at position (106.5, -32.5) and pipes at positions (107.5, -34.5), (105.5, -32.5), (105.5, -31.5), and (106.5, -31.5)

### Boiler at position(111.5, -32.0)
Consists of boiler at position (111.5, -32.0) and pipes at positions (109.5, -33.5), (110.5, -33.5), (111.5, -33.5), (112.5, -33.5), and (113.5, -33.5)

### Generator at position(117.5, -30.5)
Consists of steam engine at position (117.5, -30.5) and pipes at positions (115.5, -33.5), (116.5, -33.5), and (117.5, -33.5)

### Copper Plate Mine at position(41.0, -82.0)
Consists of burner mining drill at position (41.0, -82.0) and furnace at position (41.0, -80.0)

### Electricity Network
Consists of small electric poles at positions (111.5, -30.5), (115.5, -32.5), (115.5, -30.5), (120.5, -26.5), and (112.5, -24.5)

### Belt System
Consists of transport belts at positions (39.5, -83.5), (38.5, -79.5), (63.5, -53.5), and (64.5, -53.5)

### ERROR TIPS
* Errors when using connect_entities function
  - Make sure to pass the correct number of arguments to the connect_entities function. It takes 3 positional arguments, not 5.
  - Ensure that the positions passed to the connect_entities function are of the correct type.
* Errors when placing entities
  - Make sure to check if the tile is occupied by another entity before attempting to place a new entity.
* Errors when using offshore pumps
  - Make sure to connect the offshore pump to a fluid system to avoid "no fluid present in connections" warnings.
* Errors when using boilers
  - Make sure to provide fuel to the boiler to avoid "out of fuel" warnings.
* Errors when using generators
  - Make sure to connect the generator to a fluid system to avoid "no input liquid" warnings.

### NAMESPACE
* connect_entities function
  - Invoked multiple times with incorrect arguments, resulting in TypeError.
  - Should be used to connect two entities with a pipe.
* offshore_pump variable
  - Assigned the value of an offshore pump entity.
  - Type: Entity
* boiler variable
  - Assigned the value of a boiler entity.
  - Type: Entity
* Prototype.Pipe
  - Used as an argument to the connect_entities function.
  - Type: Prototype
